programme.desc: Ex-C.I.A. espião Bob Ho assume sua tarefa mais difícil até hoje: cuidar dos três filhos de sua namorada, que não gostaram muito do namorado de sua mãe.

programme.title: Ragnarok, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Um arqueólogo fica obcecado pelos escritos encontrados em um navio viking, que podem solucionar o mistério de Ragnarok Porém, durante suas buscas, ele acaba despertando acidentalmente um monstro gigantesco.

programme.title: O Rei Da Montanha, (2022, Foreign Drama)
programme.desc: Nesta aventura da mitologia nórdica, Espen 'Ash Lad' embarca, junto a seus irmãos, em uma perigosa missão para resgatar a princesa de um vilão conhecido como o Rei da Montanha — com o intuito de ganhar a recompensa e salvar sua família da ruína.

programme.title: Em Busca do Paraíso, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Forçado fazer uma jornada perigosa, um nobre guerreiro se depara com inúmeras dificuldades, lugares misteriosos, magia e aventura para chegar ao que seria o paraíso distante.

programme.title: O Fantasma, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: A história começa como uma expedição à ilha de Bengalla, buscando as Caveiras de Touganda. Devido à sua enorme energia, elas podem ser desastrosas para a raça humana. Agora, o mal encontrou rival à altura e a aventura ganhou um nome: Fantasma!

programme.title: Os Piratas da Rua de Baixo, (2020, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: Quando uma família de piratas se muda para a chata Sandsborough, os vizinhos não ficam muito felizes. Michiel e seu novo amigo pirata Billy tentam fazer com que a família se misture, mas seu arquiinimigo chega à cidade e planeja roubar um tesouro.

programme.title: Fora do Rumo, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Um detetive de Hong Kong se une a um jogador americano para lutar contra um notório criminoso chinês.

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da máfia japonesa suspeita de ser vítima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: Bodyguard - Resgate de Risco, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Um especialista em artes marciais entra para trabalhar como guarda-costas para a filha de um rico homem de negócios. A empresa de segurança, propriedade de um velho amigo do combatente, esconde um plano de poder obscuro.

programme.title: Três Ladrões e Um Bebê, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Para o compulsivo jogador de Slipper (Jackie Chan), existe apenas uma coisa mais aterrorizante do que os credores - o som do choro de um bebê. Mas e se um bebê se transforma-se no salvador de suas dívidas?

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: O Matador - Missão Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele está cuidando é sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: O Monge à Prova de Balas, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a história de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: Cão de briga, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma máquina de matar, (Jet Li) é campeão de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: Girls! Girls! Girls!, (1962, Musical)
programme.desc: Elvis plays a charter-boat skipper who helps tourists land the big ones. Of course, plenty of beautiful girls want to land Elvis. But there’s something Elvis likes almost as much as romance–a boat!

programme.title: Father Goose, (1964, Political Comedies)
programme.desc: Cary Grant stars in one of his funniest roles as a boozy beachcomber sitting out WWII in peace - until the Allies recruit him to be a lookout on the South Pacific isle.

programme.title: Run Silent, Run Deep, (1958, War)
programme.desc: The legendary Clark Gable and Burt Lancaster star in this gripping, classic military drama as a submarine commander (Gable) drives his men and his 1st officer (Lancaster) to the brink of mutiny in his quest to sink an enemy sub. Robert Wise directs.

programme.title: Ten Seconds to Hell, (1959, War)
programme.desc: In this gritty WW II classic from director Robert Aldrich, Jeff Chandler and Jack Palance star as demolition experts who return to bombed-out Berlin to accept the very dangerous job of defusing unexploded bombs scattered throughout the city.

programme.title: In Harm's Way, (1965, War)
programme.desc: Producer-director Otto Preminger’s epic treatment of the bombing of Pearl Harbor details the devastating attack on the Hawaiian naval base as well as the explosive, behind-the-scenes stories.

programme.title: The Train, (1964, War)
programme.desc: Screen greats Burt Lancaster, Paul Scofield and Jeanne Moreau star in this suspense-laden tale of justice and retribution as a French Resistance fighter (Lancaster) attempts to stop a Nazi commander from looting the art treasures of Paris.

programme.title: The Great Escape, (1963, War)
programme.desc: Steve McQueen, James Garner, and Richard Attenborough headline a stellar cast in one of the most ingenious and suspenseful adventure films of all time as a team of Allied soldiers mount a daring escape from an inescapable Nazi POW camp.

programme.title: Jack Reacher, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher leaps off the pages of Lee Child's novel and onto the big screen in this thriller. When a horrible crime is committed, all evidence points to the suspect in custody, who offers up a single note in defense: "Get Jack Reacher!"

programme.title: Gripped by the desire to see Nawaki and Dan, Tsunade almost succumbs to Orochimaru’s tempting offer.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Orochimaru and Kabuto use a summoning jutsu to call forth a giant snake. Still drugged and unable to fully use his chakra, Jiraiya summons little Gamakichi.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto’s ninja way is to never go back on his word. Naruto is seriously injured by Kabuto and hovers on the verge of death.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Jiraiya, Tsunade and Orochimaru all release their summoning jutsu. And a fierce battle begins.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Tsunade, Naruto, and the others start heading back to the Leaf Village where Tsunade will formally become the Fifth Hokage. At Tsunade's urging, they stop at a town with hot springs.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto asks Tsunade to heal Sasuke and Lee before she is installed as the Hokage. After examining Lee, she tells him to find a path other than that of a shinobi.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Lee hesitates when Tsunade asks him whether he will quit pursuing the path of a ninja or choose to undergo a risky surgery with only a fifty percent chance of success.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After being advised by Tsunade to quit the path of the shinobi, Lee recalls his first meeting with his teacher Guy.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and his two squadmates have always wanted to see what Kakashi looks like under his mask. The three do whatever they can to reveal his whole face.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Sasuke, and Sakura are to protect the runners in a race being held during the Todoroki Shrine's ceremonial ritual held every four years.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The chief retainers think that Idate has made a farce of their great traditional festival. Jirocho believes that Idate has fled with some plan in mind.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and his squad manage to catch up to Idate, only to find him hurt and unconscious with Aoi nearby.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Despite interference from Aoi, Idate continues his run. Idate still trusts no one, and it’s revealed that during the Chunin Exams, Idate’s older brother was the proctor who posed the tenth question.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Boss Jirocho waits, confident that Idate will win. But Aoi, the ninja sent by the Wagarashi clan, stands in the way.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru is promoted to chunin, and he and his squadmates celebrate at a BBQ restaurant. In the hospital, Lee decides to undergo a dangerous surgery to repair his body so that he can remain a ninja.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and Sasuke release their ultimate weapons against each other, and just in time, Kakashi arrives to stop the fight.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Sound Ninja Four, Kidomaru, Sakon, Jirobo and Tayuya, suddenly appear before Sasuke. Sakura is concerned about the Curse Mark placed on Sasuke by Orochimaru…
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sakura’s pleas fall on deaf ears, and Sasuke leaves Hidden Leaf Village. When Tsunade learns of this, she summons Shikamaru to lead his first mission as a chunin.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Sound Ninja Four race toward Orochimaru’s lair with Sasuke in hand. They’re discovered and challenged by the jonin Genma and Raido…
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others are trapped in Jirobo’s Earth Dome Prison. They try to pound their way out, but the walls regenerate each time.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After they are freed from the Earth Dome Prison, Shikamaru and the others take off after the remaining Sound while Choji stays behind.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After Choji takes the yellow pill it looks as if he may win the battle, until Jirobo transforms into Second State, giving him immense power.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Assuming that the Leaf squad could never get past Jirobo, the remaining Sound ninja don’t bother to lay traps along the way.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Neji takes on Kidomaru while the others continue their pursuit of Sasuke and the remaining Sound ninja.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kidomaru changes tactics and creates a bow and arrow to attack Neji’s blind spot.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Shikamaru, Kiba and Akamaru are in hot pursuit of Sasuke and the Sound ninja. Naruto and Kiba are upset that they have been unable to catch up and decide to try a surprise attack at night.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Akamaru sets explosives in the trees to trap Sakon. But an incensed Sakon turns the tables, and the explosives end up sending Kiba, Akamaru and Sakon off a cliff.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Layer Cake, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Planning to retire and begin a new life, Mr. X (Daniel Craig, Lara Croft: Tomb Raider), a successful West End drug dealer, has been asked for one last favor: to negotiate the sale of one million hits of Ecstasy. Rated: R

programme.title: Sin City: A Dame To Kill For, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Some of Sin City's most hard-boiled citizens cross paths with a few of its more reviled inhabitants.

programme.title: Drive, (2011, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Hollywood stunt performer (Ryan Gosling) who moonlights as a wheelman discovers that a contract has been put on him after a heist gone wrong.

programme.title: Runaway Jury, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: A jury fixer plays a deadly cat-and-mouse game with a jury member and a mysterious outsider who both offer to 'deliver' the verdict to the highest bidder. Soon, lives and millions of dollars are at stake in this pulse-pounder filled with twists and turns.

programme.title: Layer Cake, (2004, Thriller)

programme.desc: Following a near-fatal gun battle, Marcus recalls his journey from orphaned street kid from the Bronx to making his mark in the drug trade to teaming up with a fellow ex-con (Terrence Howard) for his shot at becoming a successful rap artist.

programme.title: Coming to America, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Join EDDIE MURPHY on an unforgettable comic quest to the New World. As an African Prince, it's time for him to find a princess. The mission leads him and his most loyal friend (ARSENIO HALL) to New York. Watch Murphy and Hall in classic cameo roles!

programme.title: Footloose, (1984, Romance)
programme.desc: A rebellious city boy finds himself in an uptight Midwestern town where dancing and therefore all youthful joy has been banned.

programme.title: St. Elmo's Fire, (1985, Romance)
programme.desc: Seven friends, recent college graduates, are searching for a place in the real world, as they face issues of career and commitment. Rating: R

programme.title: Coming to America, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Join EDDIE MURPHY on an unforgettable comic quest to the New World. As an African Prince, it's time for him to find a princess. The mission leads him and his most loyal friend (ARSENIO HALL) to New York. Watch Murphy and Hall in classic cameo roles!

programme.title: Footloose, (1984, Romance)
programme.desc: A rebellious city boy finds himself in an uptight Midwestern town where dancing and therefore all youthful joy has been banned.

programme.desc: Eight kidnapped women. All beautiful. All talented. All in danger of having their lives cut cruelly short if police detective Alex Cross and key witness Kate McTiernan can’t locate the elusive “collector” who calls himself Casanova.

programme.desc: A Chinese-American lesbian and her traditionalist mother are reluctant to go public with secret loves that clash against cultural expectations.

programme.desc: Two escaped convicts are mistaken as consultants to a local beauty pageant in the town of Happy, Texas, and masquerade as the couple orchestrating the pageant. The two quickly meet with outrageously unpredictable consequences!

programme.title: Clueless, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: Citizen Ruth, (1996, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: In this outrageous satire, Laura Dern is Ruth Stoops, an irresponsible, care-free drug addict pregnant for the fifth time, horrifying everyone around her. Soon, Ruth's at the forefront of a national debate, when all she wants to do is party.

programme.title: Happy, Texas, (1999, Screwball)
programme.desc: Two escaped convicts are mistaken as consultants to a local beauty pageant in the town of Happy, Texas, and masquerade as the couple orchestrating the pageant. The two quickly meet with outrageously unpredictable consequences!

programme.title: The Wood, (1999, African-American Romance)
programme.desc: Lots of guys have second thoughts about marriage. Three hours before his wedding, Roland is having third, fourth and fifth thoughts. Good thing he’s got buddies Slim and Mike around to help.

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding, (1997, Romance)
programme.desc: Commitment-shy Jules Potter reluctantly realizes she is in love with her best friend Michael. There is just one catch: he's about to marry someone else. Jules will do anything to steal him back... except tell him the simple truth.

programme.title: Clueless, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.desc: Young, brash, and brilliant Dr. Benjamin Stone completes his residency at a gritty Washington D.C. hospital and heads out on a road trip to California for fun, sun and lots of money as a Beverly Hills plastic surgeon. But his plan soon turns to chaos.

programme.desc: Fresh from his recent jailbreak, criminal mastermind George C. Scott is already plotting his next bank heist. This time he's thinking big...he's not just taking the loot, he's stealing the whole bank in a film brimming with imaginative silliness.

programme.title: Gone In 60 Seconds, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Buckle-up as Eleanor, the fast and furious Ford Fastback Mustang, takes you on a full-throttle ride you'll never forget. The Assignment: To steal 48 muscle and exotic cars! The Challenge: Avoid getting caught!

programme.title: Walking Tall, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: Based on the life of Tennessee sheriff Buford Pusser whom almost single-handily cleaned up his small town of crime and corruption, but at a personal cost of his family life and nearly his own life.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Big 4 Nezbitt challenges Duke, Tristan, and Serenity for the right to gain control of three bodies at once! Will Serenity's errors cost her team the ultimate price when Tristan and Duke can't cover for her mistakes?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: One down, two to go! With the loss of Tristan, Serenity is heartbroken. Can she pull herself together and remember the lessons Tristan taught her to turn the duel around?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tristan's back... but he's not who he appears to be when he kidnaps Mokuba! It's time for Kaiba to stop monkeying around and rescue his brother, but he's confronted by Big 5 Leichter!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Big 5's Satellite Cannon attacks Kaiba's monsters from deep space! Mokuba's unwavering faith in Kaiba inspires him to believe that his brother will pull out the victory, but Noah has plans to ruin their brotherhood...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba arrives at Noah's sanctuary to rescue Mokuba, but Mokuba wants to stay with Noah! Has Mokuba seen the evil within Kaiba, or is something more sinister in the works?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah gives the Big Five one last chance to redeem themselves in a five-on-two tag team duel where Yugi and Joey take on the entire Big Five!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five concentrate their attack on Joey so that Yugi would be forced to duel all alone! Outmanned and overpowered, Yugi and Joey are near the end of the line!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five summon an almighty dragon that previously defeated Joey, Mai, and Mokuba! Joey and Yugi pull out all the stops, but is that enough to avoid their minds being scattered over virtual reality?
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel for control of KaibaCorp when Noah squares off against Kaiba! But can Kaiba fight at full strength after he learns the hidden truth about Noah... and the tragic past that made him what he is today?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah's Shinato's Ark steals monsters into its keep to use as an impenetrable wall of servants! How can Kaiba hurt Noah when Noah has an endless stream of monsters to protect himself with?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's about to finish Noah, but Mokuba protects Noah from his final blow! Will Kaiba sacrifice his beloved brother in exchange for freedom, or will the brotherly bond remain unbreakable?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: For every turn that passes, one of Yugi's friends is transformed into stone! As more and more of his friends harden into solid rock, can Yugi defeat Noah before he runs out of turns and transforms into stone himself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are petrified into solid stone statues, but their spirits live on! Their combined souls energize Yugi into a noble fight, but is spirit going to win the duel when Yugi's not drawing the right cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has defeated Noah... but they still can't escape from the virtual world! The real reason behind their entrapment is revealed... as is the true villain pulling the strings!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Kaiba squares off against his stepfather Gozaburo for their final battle, Yugi and friends are attacked by endless hordes of monsters! Their only hope is Noah, but they can't expect help from their enemy... can they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Time is almost up before the missile's explosion destroys Yugi and friends! Will the Battle City finalists beat the clock and live to duel another day in the stunning conclusion to the virtual world saga!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends arrive at KaibaCorp Island where the Battle City finalists will compete in the ultimate dueling arena! Get ready for the awesome four-person battle royal where any duelist can attack anyone else!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Honor, friendship, revenge... As each duelist remembers what they're fighting for, the battle royal rages on where none of the duelists know where the next attack is going to come from!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey may have fought some of the fiercest fights in Battle City, but has all his training taught him to become an elite duelist? Joey's gonna show what he's made of in the conclusion to the four-man battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik ensnares Joey in a Shadow Game where each duelist's heart is linked with his monsters... literally! Every time a monster received damage, the duelist feels the pain instead!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik's Helpoemer send Joey's powerful cards to the graveyard before Joey can use them! Running low on cards and life points, Joey's opportunities for staging a comeback are nearly depleted!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey thinks this duel can't turn any worse... but Marik has all the pieces necessary to summon The Winged Dragon of Ra! Can Joey prevent Marik from summoning the Egyptian God Card, or is victory simply not in the cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon clashes against Kaiba's Obelisk the Tormentor, what will happen when two Egyptian Gods fight each other? It's time to find out which Egyptian God is truly stronger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The clash of the two Egyptian God Monsters releases mystical energies that show Yugi and Kaiba visions of the ancient Egyptian past! What new answers do these images unlock, and what prophecies do they make for the future?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons three powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragons, but Yugi has no monsters remaining in his deck! Is losing only a matter of time, or will a long-dormant card from a fallen friend help turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba not only controls Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, but his Final Attack Orders card leaves Yugi with only three cards in his deck! If Yugi loses, he'll have to give up his chance to save the world from Marik's evil!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tired of Kaiba's insults, Joey challenges Kaiba for third place in the Battle City Tournament! Has Joey mastered enough strategies to take down the top dog, or is Kaiba going to wallop Joey like a pathetic puppy?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba attacks with his mighty Blue-Eyes White Dragon, but Joey has no monsters to defend with! Joey's luck has run out, so it's time for him to rely on skill!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Kaiba's battle reaches its roaring climax! Will Joey take down his biggest headache and actually teach Kaiba a thing or two about being a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the critical Battle City showdown with the fate of the world at stake: Yami Yugi vs. Marik! If Yami Yugi loses, Yugi is taking a permanent vacation into the Shadow Realm!

programme.title: While Luffy continues his battle with Blueno, Soge King’s giant companions make their presence felt, and the assassins of CP9 experiment with Devil Fruits!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Don't stop! Hoist the counterattack signal!

programme.title: Luffy batters a baffled Blueno with his powerful new fighting style, and the cowardly Spandam begins to panic at the sound of the Straw Hats approaching!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.sub-title: Give us your answer, robin! The straw hats' outcry!

programme.title: Flash back to Robin’s days as a young girl, her dangerous pursuit of forbidden knowledge, and her encounter with a friendly giant.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Robin's past! The girl who was called a devil!

programme.title: Robin’s flashback continues with the heartbreaking arrival of her mother – and the government’s cruel and brutal invasion of a peaceful island!

programme.sub-title: Fated mother and daughter! The mother's name is olvia!

programme.title: Professor Clover reveals a startling and sinister theory about the World Government, Robin reunites with her mother, and a giant joins the fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The tragedy of ohara! The terror of the buster call!

programme.sub-title: Say you want to live! We are your friends!

programme.sub-title: Parting builds a man's character! Sanji and chopper!

programme.sub-title: Obtain the five keys! The straw hat pirates vs. Cp9!

programme.desc: One Piece

programme.desc: One Piece

programme.sub-title: Boss luffy returns! Is it a dream or reality? Lottery ruckus!

programme.title: The madcap throwback continues as Luffy and the gang – along with a crowd of characters from the Alabasta arc – competes for a priceless treasure hidden inside a tasty snack!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A big rice cake tossing race at the castle! Red nose's plot!

programme.sub-title: Resounding bad news! Buster call invoked!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Five namis? Nami strikes back with mirages!

programme.title: Franky and Nami come up with a plan to stop Chopper’s rampage, but it could prove deadly to the not-so-little reindeer. Usopp and Zoro are thrilled to finally be free of each other!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Nami's decision! Fire at the out-of-control chopper!

programme.sub-title: Hunter sanji makes an entrance? Elegy for a lying wolf!

programme.sub-title: Spandam frightened! The hero on the tower of law!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Robin freed! Luffy vs. Lucci, showdown between leaders!

programme.title: When an ancient tree is stolen by a madman with the power to freeze time, Luffy, Usopp, and Sanji track down the culprit in an attempt to save a village’s annual festival!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Boss luffy is the culprit? Track down the missing great cherry tree!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata is even more determined to capture Lupin after an incident with Anne. Lupin and his gang will soon learn that Inspector Zenigata is a force to be reckoned with when he's raging mad.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon has been thrown into prison for a crime he did not commit. He is charged with cutting off the Little Mermaid's arm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious army steals 3 tons worth of gold under Inspector Zenigata's watch. His superiors are convinced Lupin stole the gold and holds Inspector Zenigata responsible.
programme.sub-title: Give the Gold to My Rival

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has lottery fever, or to be specific, has his eyes set on the 50 million dollar jackpot. However, Lupin discovers the lottery is rigged.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have learned a coup d'état is about to take place in one of the Caribbean countries. Amidst the chaos, they plan to steal the dictator's treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Count Bone and Lord Wave operate the Rondo Insurance Company. The two seem like perfect English gentlemen, but they make their money through dirty tactics.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Queen Gretchen of the Kingdom of Monaka dies from a car accident. As a fan of her years as a Hollywood actress, Lupin mourns her passing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Once a year, jewelers from around the country descend on New York City for a jewelry tradeshow, bringing with them their entire inventory. Combined, the jewelry is said to be worth 20 million dollars.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have Pinkerton's unbreakable safe, minus the key. Lupin breaks into the prison where the late Pinkerton was once held and finds the key hidden in his former prison cell. Now the gang has both the safe and key.
programme.sub-title: A Toast to the Con Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: At Fujiko's request, Lupin steals the Hina dolls given to the US Vice President by the Deputy Prime Minister of Japan. However, the doll heist was a trap laid out by Fujiko and her partner, Barracuda.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon pities the young boy who is afflicted with an incurable illness and swears to retrieve his father's painting for him. Will Goemon be able to keep his promise and will Lupin decipher the painting's hidden secret?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The 100-carat blue diamond, known as Hades' Tear is auctioned off at 1 billion dollars along with its accompanying Hades statue to the KL Foundation of Kingsland. Lupin and Jigen make off with Hades' Tear with ease, but they find out it's only glass.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mexico's richest woman, Madame Tequila owns a black diamond named the Black Pig of Mexico. Realizing that Lupin is after her diamond, Madame Tequila appoints Inspector Zenigata to guard it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Ivanov, the Soviet Union's newest atomic submarine from the Port of Arkhangelsk. Lupin becomes entangled in a fierce tug of war between the KGB and CIA when Fujiko decides to sell it to the highest bidder.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #9 Islands of Assasins
programme.desc: The den of the deadly Tarantulas gang, this island is the most dangerous place on Earth… and Lupin's right in the middle of it! A dark mystery haunts his past, and the key to it is on the island.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #10 Tokyo Crisis
programme.desc: When Lupin and his bandit buddies attempt to steal a set of historically significant photographic plates, it turns out they're not the only ones with eyes on the prize in this thievish tale of mayhem and millionaires.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #11 The Columbus Files
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are after the mysterious treasure known only as Columbus' Egg. Fujiko was able to memorize the Egg's location, but when she's attacked and loses her memory, all seems lost. No one else knows where it is. What's a thief to do?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #12 Missed by a Dollar
programme.desc: At an auction in New York, attendees are shocked when a mysterious man bids $1,000,000 on a plain diamond ring. The man himself is even more astounded when the President of the World Bank outbids him by a single dollar. The man is Lupin!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata arrives in San Marino after receiving a note from Lupin III. Instead of a declaration of a new theft, it's a wedding invitation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Marlow Brozzi, a soccer player from San Marino. A mafia member has proof that Brozzi is cheating so Brozzi approaches Lupin for help.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang managed to steal a fragment of Marie Antoinette's necklace, but Jigen has been captured by Nyx.

programme.title: Cyborg, (1989, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army, when the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control.

programme.title: Predestination, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: For his final assignment, a top temporal agent must pursue the one criminal that has eluded him throughout time. The chase turns into a unique, surprising and mind-bending exploration of love, fate, identity and time travel taboos.

programme.title: Anaconda, (1997, Creature Features)
programme.desc: A monstrous snake terrorizes filmmakers on the Amazon River in this blockbuster hit starring Jon Voight, Jennifer Lopez, Ice Cube and Eric Stoltz.

programme.title: The Fifth Element, (1997, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Milla Jovovich, and Gary Oldman star in acclaimed director Luc Besson's outrageous sci-fi adventure, an extravagantly styled tale of good against evil set in an unbelievable twenty-third century world.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks, (1961, Drama)
programme.desc: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.

programme.title: Lonesome Dove, (1989, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Texas Rangers and long-time ranching partners Gus McCrae and Woodrow Call meet their old friend Jake, and decide to strike out from their south Texas base and drive a cattle herd to Montana.

programme.title: Lonesome Dove, (1989, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: McCrae and Wood's cattle drive faces deadly situations. Sheriff July Johnson heads to Texas, and former prostitute Lorena is abandoned by Jake and kidnapped by the psychotic Blue Duck.
programme.sub-title: Lonesome Dove: Part II - On The Trail

programme.title: Lonesome Dove, (1989, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Gus and July save Lorena from Blue Duck, but at a deadly cost. Jake runs with a bad crowd and pays the price. July accepts that his wife has left him and stays on at Clara's with his newborn son.
programme.sub-title: Lonesome Dove: Part III - The Plains

programme.title: Lonesome Dove, (1989, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: The cattle drive reaches Nebraska, where Gus and Clara reunite. Drought and Indian attacks take their toll as the drive reaches Montana, and Gus is wounded. Call honors his best friend's request.

programme.title: High Noon, (1951, Drama)
programme.desc: Gary Cooper won the Oscar for the Best Actor in this classic tale of a lawman who stands alone to defend a town of cowardly citizens against a gang of revenge-seeking criminals.

programme.title: The Fugitive Kind, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: In this Tennessee Williams masterpiece, Marlon Brando is superb as a paradoxical drifter drawn into the desperate lives of two passionate women, Maureen Stapleton and Joanne Woodward, in a small Mississippi town.

programme.title: Hang 'Em High, (1968, Drama)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood stars in this brazen tale about a rampaging band of vigilantes who make two mistakes: they hang the wrong man and they don't finish the job. Inger Stevens, Pat Hingle, Bruce Dern & Dennis Hopper co-star in this action-packed western.

programme.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: An epic set against the breathtaking landscapes of ancient China, Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon combines the exhilarating martial arts choreography by Yuen Wo-Ping with the sensitivity and classical storytelling of an Ang Lee film.

programme.title: Across the Universe, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: A love story about a British boy and an American girl set against the backdrop of the social upheaval of the 1960s.

programme.title: Rachel Getting Married, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: When Kym, returns to the Buchman family home for the wedding of her sister Rachel, she brings a long history of personal crises, family conflict, and tragedy along with her. Rated -R

programme.title: Southland Tales, (2006, Thriller)
programme.desc: SOUTHLAND TALES is an ensemble piece set in the futuristic landscape of Los Angeles, as it stands on the brink of social, economic and environmental disaster. Boxer Santaros (Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson) is an action star who's stricken with amnesia.

programme.title: Adaptation, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Director Spike Jonze delivers a stunningly original comedy that seamlessly blends fictional characters and situations with the lives of real people. As Charlie struggles to adapt Orlean's best-selling book "The Orchid Thief".Rated: R

programme.title: Snatch, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A diamond heist gone haywire launches gangsters, bookies, and a dog on a rollicking ride through the rugged world of bare-knuckle boxing in search of the missing stone. Critically acclaimed comedy from Guy Richie.

programme.title: Hustle & Flow, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: The tale of DJay, a pimp whose hustle selling sexy Nola leaves him wondering if this is it for him. Only when he trades contraband for a keyboard and bumps into his old schoolfriend Key does he see a way out by laying down some tracks.

programme.title: Daryl and Dog get captured by the Reapers; they are taken to the Meridian and reconnect with a familiar figure from their past.

programme.title: Escaping from walkers, Connie and Virgil hide in a house occupied by mysterious creatures; Pope tests Daryl's loyalty to the Reapers with a conflicting mission; Kelly leaves Alexandria in search of Connie.

programme.title: The Reapers defend Meridian from an incoming herd; Pope suspects Maggie is behind the attack, while Daryl treads carefully; Alexandrians scramble to protect themselves when a violent storm leaves them vulnerable to walkers.

programme.desc: Seiya asks Usagi out on a date, to which she agrees. Sailor Iron Mouse attempts to make up for her recent failures by going after Seiya’s star seed.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Chibi has been coming home with lots of snacks. Curious where she’s getting the snacks from, Usagi and the girls decide to follow Chibi-Chibi.
programme.sub-title: Chibi-Chibi's Mystery: The Big Noisy Chase

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi teamed up with Seiya for the school softball tournament. Usagi becomes a target of Seiya’s jealous fans, who think she is hitting on him.
programme.sub-title: The Shining Power of a Star: Chibi-Chibi's Transformation

programme.desc: Sailor Aluminum Siren learns that Usagi is Sailor Moon. She sets a trap on a plane in order to get Usagi’s attention.

programme.desc: Ami and the others try to clear up the misunderstanding the Three Lights have about Usagi.

programme.desc: Minako is close to realizing her lifelong dream of becoming an idol after making it to the final round of auditions in a talent-search contest.

programme.desc: Sailor Lead Crow finds a note left behind by her deceased friend Sailor Aluminum Siren that contains information on Sailor Moon’s true identity.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Princess Kakyu appears before the Sailor Guardians. Princess Kakyu explains that she has come to Earth in search of the Light of Hope.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi finally confesses to Rei that she’s been unable to get in touch with Mamoru. The Three Lights publicly announce their intention to disband.
programme.sub-title: Princess Kakyu Perishes: Advent of Galaxia

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Princess Kakyu perishes after being defeated by Galaxia. The Sailor Star Lights go after Galaxia to avenge their fallen princess.
programme.sub-title: Countdown to Destruction: The Sailor Guardians' Last Battle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Mars, Mercury, Jupiter and Venus lose their star seeds after shielding Sailor Moon and the Star Lights from Galaxia’s attack.

programme.desc: Galaxia is revealed to be the Legendary Sailor Guardian who sealed away Chaos. She has become corrupt and has gone on to conquer the galaxy herself.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi Tsukino is a schoolgirl who meets a talking cat named Luna. Usagi is transformed into Sailor Moon, the guardian who fights for love and justice.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A house of fortune opens up and gains popularity for its predictions. The customers begin to act violent. Usagi and Luna decide to investigate.
programme.sub-title: Punishment Awaits: The House Of Fortune Is The Monster Mansion

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls in town are tuning in to a radio program that reads out love letters. A sleeping sickness is plaguing the town that puts people to sleep.
programme.sub-title: The Mysterious Sleeping Sickness: Protect the Girls In Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi is shocked to find out that she’s gained weight from too much eating. Determined to get back into shape, Usagi and her friends join a gym.
programme.sub-title: Learn How to Be Skinny from Usagi

programme.title: A Saga Viking

programme.title: Operação Zodíaco

programme.title: O Imperador
programme.desc: Após se tornar alvo de seu irmão mais velho, o herdeiro de um trono decide procurar a ajuda de sua irmã e de um cavaleiro desacreditado, Jacob (Nicolas Cage), que precisa enfrentar vários problemas pessoais. Juntos, eles buscam o apoio de Gallain (Hayden Christensen), um lendário cavaleiro conhecido como Fantasma Branco.

programme.title: Sobibor
programme.desc: O oficial soviético, Alexander Pechersky, organiza uma revolta e fuga em massa de prisioneiros do campo de extermínio de Sobibór, em outubro de 1943.

programme.title: A Espada De Deus - A Última Cruzada
programme.desc: Dois cavaleiros cristãos chegam a uma ilha remota com a intenção de converter os aldeões pagãos à sua religião. O primeiro busca conquistá-los com compreensão e humildade, enquanto o segundo confia na intimidação e na violência. À medida que a ruptura se forma, os aldeões devem decidir de que lado estão, e os homens, até onde estão dispostos a ir e quanto sangue será derramado.

programme.title: A Menina e o Leão
programme.desc: Mia se muda para a África do Sul com sua família para administrar uma fazenda de leões e desenvolve um vínculo especial com Charlie, um filhote de leão branco. As coisas mudam quando ela descobre o segredo de seu pai. Desolada com a possibilidade de Charlie estar em perigo, Mia decide fugir. Os dois partem em uma aventura épica em busca de outra terra onde Charlie possa viver seguro e livre

programme.title: O Mistério da Fé
programme.desc: Uma pequena cidade do interior enfrenta os desafios após adolescentes sofrerem overdose acidental

programme.title: O Diário de Tati
programme.desc: A adolescente Tati conta, de forma divertida, todos os problemas de sua juventude ao seu diário. Desde ficar em recuperação em matemática até os esforços para conseguir fisgar Zeca, sua paixão atual.

programme.title: Pudsey: Este Cão é Um Herói
programme.desc: Pudsey é um cachorro de rua de Londres, ele encontra Molly, George e Tommy, e descobre um plano secreto.

programme.title: Nada é para sempre
programme.desc: Embora Norman e Paul, filhos de um pastor protestante, tenham recebido uma educação rígida, eles também desfrutaram de liberdade. Norman, um jovem reservado e criterioso, é professor e está apaixonado. Paul, extrovertido, é jornalista e leva uma vida desordenada. Apesar de tudo, há uma coisa que sempre os manterá juntos: o rio selvagem que atravessa Montana, onde aprenderam a pescar.

programme.title: Meus Vizinhos Alienígenas
programme.desc: Quando um astronauta mundialmente famoso volta para casa após sua última missão, ele traz uma lembrança única para sua esposa e dois filhos: um pedaço de um asteróide que caiu em sua estação espacial.

programme.title: A Última Peça
programme.desc: Paula Stephânia organiza uma festa surpresa para o irmão e, quando está terminando de decorar a casa com muitos dinossauros, descobre que faltava uma peça em um dos brinquedos. Para recuperá-lo, Paula terá que enfrentar o malvado dono de uma loja de brinquedos, vivendo um dia de grandes desafios e aventuras. Será que ela conseguirá terminar a decoração a tempo?

programme.title: Ring 2: O Chamado
programme.desc: Reiko esconde Yôichi quando seu filho começa a exibir poderes terríveis. Enquanto isso, Mai Takano e as autoridades começam uma busca desesperada por eles, enquanto a misteriosa maldição do Anel se espalha.

programme.title: Ringu O
programme.desc: Neste prelúdio de Ring, uma jovem Sadako se torna uma atriz na esperança de escapar de seu passado conturbado. Mas estranhas visões e poderes terríveis começam a se manifestar...

programme.title: Vitimas Do Escuro
programme.desc: Um casal e sua filha se mudam para a Colômbia para assumir o controle de uma fábrica da família, mas percebem que sua nova casa é assombrada.

programme.title: Inimigo Em Casa
programme.desc: Quando Danny testemunha o assassinato de um homem por seu padrasto Rick, o pai de Danny, Frank, precisa proteger seu filho do maior perigo.

programme.title: DMX: Corrida Fatal
programme.desc: Jack Tyson está prestes a ganhar um prêmio em dinheiro em uma corrida ilegal de carros do México à Califórnia quando uma mulher desesperada, fugindo do namorado gangster que está organizando o torneio, pula em seu carro implorando por ajuda.

programme.title: O Massacre da Família Manson
programme.desc: Nesta abordagem única sobre os infames assassinatos de Manson, seguimos duas gerações de eventos reais assustadores que ocorrem no 10050 Cielo Drive, um dos endereços mais notórios dos Estados Unidos.

programme.title: Segurança Nacional
programme.desc: O governo brasileiro lidera os países latino-americanos na luta contra os cartéis de drogas. Em resposta, os cartéis de drogas iniciam uma série de ataques contra as cidades e os recursos naturais do Brasil.

programme.title: Ring 2: O Chamado
programme.desc: Reiko esconde Yôichi quando seu filho começa a exibir poderes terríveis. Enquanto isso, Mai Takano e as autoridades começam uma busca desesperada por eles, enquanto a misteriosa maldição do Anel se espalha.

programme.title: Ringu O
programme.desc: Neste prelúdio de Ring, uma jovem Sadako se torna uma atriz na esperança de escapar de seu passado conturbado. Mas estranhas visões e poderes terríveis começam a se manifestar...

programme.title: Vitimas Do Escuro
programme.desc: Um casal e sua filha se mudam para a Colômbia para assumir o controle de uma fábrica da família, mas percebem que sua nova casa é assombrada.

programme.title: Inimigo Em Casa
programme.desc: Quando Danny testemunha o assassinato de um homem por seu padrasto Rick, o pai de Danny, Frank, precisa proteger seu filho do maior perigo.

programme.title: Reféns do Mal
programme.desc: Coisas sinistras começam a acontecer com os sequestradores que estão mantendo um menino para resgate em uma cabana remota.

programme.title: Efeito Dominó
programme.desc: Em setembro de 1971 foi construído um túnel para dentro da caixa-forte de um banco na Baker Street, em Londres. De lá foram roubados diversos cofres de dinheiro e jóias, no valor de milhões de libras.

programme.title: Xeque-Mate
programme.desc: Slevin Kelevra (Josh Hartnett) está com vários problemas em sua vida. O prédio onde mora foi condenado, sua carteira de identidade foi roubada e ele recentemente flagrou sua namorada na cama com outro homem. Para escapar ao menos por algum tempo dos problemas, ele consegue emprestado com seu amigo Nick Fisher (Sam Jaeger) um apartamento em Nova York. Paralelamente um plano está sendo tramado no submundo do crime de Nova York. Para se vingar da morte de seu filho, o Chefe (Morgan Freeman) planeja um golpe no filho de seu arquiinimigo, o Rabino (Ben Kingsley). O Chefe contrata Goodkat (Bruce Willis) para executar o plano, que consiste em encontrar um apostador que deva muito dinheiro ao Chefe a ponto de aceitar matar o filho do Rabino para se livrar da dívida. O escolhido é Nick Fisher, o que faz com que Goodkat vá até seu apartamento e confunda Slevin com seu alvo.

programme.title: A Última Fronteira
programme.desc: Miguel, um médico espanhol, coloca-se em perigo para prestar tratamento médico às vítimas de revoltas militares. Wren é porta-voz de uma organização que financia assistência médica a nações empobrecidas em todo o mundo. Eles se conhecem na Libéria, onde Wren fica imediatamente impressionado com a abnegação, a habilidade médica e o charme de Miguel. Ambos iniciam um romance tórrido, que devem aprender a combinar com seu importante trabalho.

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: Blitz é um serial killer londrino que está matando policiais. O inspetor-chefe Roberts e o sargento Brant, um detetive de polícia durão, intransigente e politicamente incorreto, têm a tarefa de tentar deter o psicopata. Parece que Blitz comete os crimes para se tornar uma estrela dos tabloides - quanto mais ele mata, mais famoso se torna.

programme.title: As Duas Faces de Janeiro
programme.desc: Na década de 60, Chester e Colette são um casal que decide fazer turismo na Grécia. Eles conhecem Rydal, um americano que os ajuda nos passeios, mas que também é um vigarista. Porém, o guia trapaceiro descobre que os dois não são pessoas inocentes e uma estranha parceria acaba se formando.

programme.title: Plano de Fuga
programme.desc: Plano de Fuga traz Mel Gibson no papel de um criminoso americano que ultrapassa a fronteira entre Estados Unidos e México durante a fuga de um roubo a banco. Ele acaba preso pelas autoridades mexicanas e enviado para um presídio lotado de bandidos de alta periculosidade. Não bastasse essa experiência bizarra, ele acaba se envolvendo com uma família local e se metendo numa grande enrascada em terras estrangeiras porque a bandidagem agora quer a pele dele. Para sobreviver na prisão, ele terá que aceitar a ajuda de um garoto de apenas 9 anos (Kevin Hernandez), com quem irá planejar sua fuga.

programme.title: Efeito Dominó
programme.desc: Em setembro de 1971 foi construído um túnel para dentro da caixa-forte de um banco na Baker Street, em Londres. De lá foram roubados diversos cofres de dinheiro e jóias, no valor de milhões de libras.

Parece que Blitz comete os crimes para se tornar uma estrela dos tabloides - quanto mais ele mata, mais famoso se torna.

programme.title: Um Homem contra Wall Street
programme.desc: Jim vive com sua esposa doente. Tudo muda quando a economia colapsa e faz com que ele perca tudo.

programme.title: Condução Perigosa
programme.desc: Peter Roberts (Thomas Jane), um ex-piloto de corrida automotiva, tornou-se instrutor de motorista e durante uma de suas aulas é sequestrado por Simon Keller (John Cusack), que supostamente seria um aluno como qualquer outro. O sequestrador misterioso força ele a participar de um crime que coloca ambos na mira da polícia e da máfia, desencadeando uma perseguição.

programme.title: Uma Juíza Sem Juízo
programme.desc: Ariane Felder está grávida! Um choque, considerando que ela é uma juíza do tribunal superior com moral muito rígida, decididamente solteira. E de acordo com o teste de paternidade, o pai da criança não é outro senão Bob, um criminoso.

programme.title: Quatro Garotas... Uma Grande Confusão
programme.desc: Iris começa seu primeiro dia como temporária na Global Credit Association esperando em uma cadeira por duas horas. Isso prepara o cenário para suas (des)aventuras com os outros "órfãos corporativos", Margaret, Paula e Jane.

programme.title: Mundo adulto
programme.desc: Amy acredita estar destinada a ser poeta e busca orientação com um escritor solitário.

programme.title: Colossal
programme.desc: Depois de perder o emprego e ser expulsa de seu apartamento pelo namorado, Gloria deixa sua vida em Nova York e retorna à sua cidade natal. Quando o noticiário informa que uma criatura gigantesca está destruindo Seul, na Coreia, Gloria percebe que ela mesma está ligada a esse fenômeno distante. Gloria descobrirá por que ela tem um efeito tão colossal sobre o destino da Terra.

programme.title: Enquanto Somos Jovens
programme.desc: Josh e Cornelia, um casal sem filhos começa a passar mais tempo com um jovem casal de hipsters. Um jovem aspirante a documentarista, uma vocação que ações Josh. Logo o casal mais velho começa a desfrutar da energia transmitida pela geração mais jovem, mas, eventualmente, Josh começa a suspeitar que seu novo melhor amigo pode não ser tão honesto e confiável como o esperado.

programme.title: Loucos Por Dinheiro
programme.desc: Recém-casados, Alice e John passam por uma séria crise financeira quando encontram por acaso um velho bule de bronze que produz dinheiro sempre que eles se machucam. Agora os dois precisam decidir até onde estão dispostos a ir para enriquecer, além de manter o bule longe de outras pessoas muito interessadas neste valioso objeto.

programme.title: Uma Juíza Sem Juízo
programme.desc: Ariane Felder está grávida! Um choque, considerando que ela é uma juíza do tribunal superior com moral muito rígida, decididamente solteira. E de acordo com o teste de paternidade, o pai da criança não é outro senão Bob, um criminoso.

programme.title: Mundo adulto
programme.desc: Amy acredita estar destinada a ser poeta e busca orientação com um escritor solitário.

programme.title: Enquanto Somos Jovens

Logo o casal mais velho começa a desfrutar da energia transmitida pela geração mais jovem, mas, eventualmente, Josh começa a suspeitar que seu novo melhor amigo pode não ser tão honesto e confiável como o esperado.

programme.title: Colossal
